description: Still feeling a bit sick, Tommy stuck with his plan to show off another one of his friends.Miles was referred to us by one of our friends. This young next door stud is truly one of a kind. Tommy partied with him the night before the shoot, and it took all he had to stay away from the ladies and not cum that night. We're not surprised the ladies were googly-eyed over him.This guy has it all... looks, body, and an incredible cock, which he tells us the girls love. He's currently in school, and he says it takes up almost all his time. But he's just about to finish, and when he does, the girls better watch out.Enjoy Miles as he enjoys himself.
title: A Good Cure
